thread.title: Downtown Napa’s sizzling restaurant scene
thread.title_full: Downtown Napa’s sizzling restaurant scene - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Michael Bauer
title: Downtown Napa’s sizzling restaurant scene
text:
Photo: Sarah Rice, Special To The Chronicle Seared octopus with roasted baby carrots, mojo picon and a black garlic aioli at ZuZu. Seared octopus with roasted baby carrots, mojo picon and a black...
When Greg Cole opened Celadon in 1996, followed by Cole’s Chop House in 2000, downtown Napa was as desolate as San Francisco’s Financial District at midnight. The streets were empty; the lights in most buildings were switched off. Seared octopus with roasted baby carrots, mojo picon and a black garlic aioli at ZuZu.
